alert.note: Alert for Livingston (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 30 at 7:25PM CDT until April 30 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LIVINGSTON...CENTRAL FORD AND NORTHWESTERN IROQUOIS COUNTIES... At 724 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Piper City, or near Chatsworth, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 724 PM, quarter size hail was reported in Chatsworth with this storm. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Gilman around 740 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Thawville. Including the following interstate... I-57 between mile markers 276 and 285. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central and east central Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
